body:
Examples and templates have been comprehensively created:

✅ examples/workflows/issue-management-basic.yml
✅ examples/workflows/issue-management-advanced.yml
✅ templates/workflows/complete-ci-cd.yml
✅ templates/workflows/container-only.yml
✅ templates/workflows/library-release.yml
✅ Migration guide with step-by-step instructions
✅ Multiple configuration examples in documentation

Closing as completed.
